original_text: He hoped also that money should have been given him of Paul, that he might loose him: wherefore he sent for him the oftener, and communed with him.
korean_text: 동시에 또 바울에게서 돈을 받을까 바라는 고로 더 자주 불러 같이 이야기하더라

sentences.original_text: that money should have been given him of Paul
wherefore he sent for him the oftener
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 그를 더 자주 불렀다
